sentences.en: Fustian can't disguise the author's meager plot.
sentences.cn: 浮夸的文章掩饰不住这个作者的贫乏情节。

sentences.en: His fustian shirt, sanguineflowered, trembles its Spanish tassels at his secrets.
sentences.cn: 他身上穿的是件印有血红色大花的粗斜纹布衬衫, 每当他吐露秘密时, 西班牙式的流苏就颤悠.

sentences.en: Yossarian was unmoved by the fustian charade of the burial ceremony ( Joseph Heller )
sentences.cn: 约萨仁丝毫不为葬礼上浮夸的象征性仪式所激动 ( 约瑟夫赫勒 )

words.tran_cn: 浮夸的；用纬起毛织物的

trans.tran_cn: （通常为暗色的）厚粗棉布，粗斜纹布，夸夸其谈，纬起绒织物
trans.tran_en: a type of rough heavy cotton cloth, worn especially in the past
